value.name: Qin Dynasty Epic
value.overview: During the late stages of the Warring States era of the Qin state, Ying Zheng, Lu Bu Wei, Li Si, Wang Jian and many formidable politicians work together to unite the six states under one rule.

value.name: Master of Epic: The Animation Age
value.original_name: マスター オブ エピック
value.overview: Skits, vignettes, and interludes featuring an RPG called Master of Epic.

value.name: Xiao Zhuang Epic
value.overview: Xiaozhuang Mishi, also known as Xiaozhuang Epic, is a 2003 Chinese television series produced by You Xiaogang. The series is the first instalment in a series of four television series about the early history of the Qing Dynasty. It was followed by Huang Taizi Mishi, Taizu Mishi and Secret History of Kangxi, all of which were also produced by You Xiaogang.

value.name: The Black Tree Epic
value.overview: In "The Black Tree Epic"; the excitement, sadness and love will touch hearts as the reality of goodness and evil, the world of existence and non-existence are told side by side in the ancient lands of Anatolia in the 1950s and 1970s.

value.name: Epic Chushingura
value.overview:
Daichūshingura is a television dramatization of the events of the Forty-seven Ronin. The first episode aired on January 5, 1971, and the 52nd and final episode appeared on December 28 of the same year. The NET network broadcast it in the Tuesday evening 9:00–9:56 prime-time slot in Japan.

The series featured an all-star cast. The central actor was Toshiro Mifune, who portrayed Ōishi Kuranosuke; Yoko Tsukasa his wife; and kabuki actor Onoe Kikugorō VII their son Chikara.

value.name: Epic Rap Battles of History
value.overview: Pitting notable historical and pop culture figures, real and fictional, against one another in a rap battle format.

value.name: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
value.original_name: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
value.overview: Fourth-grade friends George and Harold have a shared love of pranks and comic books -- and turning their principal into an undies-wearing superhero.

value.name: EVERGLOW: EPICK LOG
value.overview: The first webseries by Yue Hua's newest girl group EVERGLOW.

value.name: Epic of Divinity Light
value.overview: At the end of the Han Dynasty, the aura of heaven and earth disappeared for no reason, and the exorcist division, which was in its prime for a time, fell apart, and was known as "all the ways to be silent." In the four years of Jin Taiyuan, the only surviving exorcist in the world, Chen Xing, came to Xiangyang to find his destined guardian. Relying on the heart lamp of the magical tool lodged in his soul, Chen Xing worked hard to find a way to restore the spiritual energy of the heavens and the earth to fight against the imminent resurrection of the demons, and also forged a deep friendship with the guardian of the martial arts Xiangshu during the journey. The animation will integrate elements such as ancient style, gods and demons, fantasy, and battle, to present a magnificent, ups and downs heroic legend to the audience.

value.name: Les Bleus 2018, The Russian Epic
value.original_name: Les Bleus 2018, au cœur de l'épopée Russe
value.overview: Les Bleus 2018 – At The Heart of the Russian Epic is a documentary series that tells the story of an extraordinary adventure. At the core of Les Bleus, we see how the group lives and manages the pressure, the matches and gives its utmost to succeed. The film follows the team from the friendlies of March to June and their preparations in Clairefontaine up to the matches in the World Cup.

value.name: Team Epic
value.overview:
Team Epic is a fast-paced live action comedy that provides an original look into the everyday lives of super-heroes in Canada, and how they become the figures we know and revere.

Captain Epic, an up-and-coming superhero, is desperate to be adored by the idol-hungry public. In order to realize his glimpses of grandeur, he assembles an ad hoc team of heroes. His dream team consists of an attention disabled speedster, an absent-minded telepath, an unbelievably powerful Yoga nut, and a provocative but jaded secretary/sidekick. The unique band of heroes fights together to save the world, and Captain Epic inches closer and closer to his dream.

value.name: Epic Night
value.overview: After graduation day, three friends are facing going their separate ways and want to make the last night of college count. You play as Martin, juggling his genius crush and his stressed-out BFF, all on a vital mission to get into the coolest graduation party of all time. Will Martin choose love, loyalty or something completely different? It's up to you to turn this grad night into the most epic night ever.

value.name: Epic Adventures with Bertie Gregory
value.overview: Follow the escapades of a young Explorer as he travels the world capturing extraordinary footage of wild animals.

value.name: Epic NPC Man: Dungeons & Dragons
value.overview: Rowan, Adam, Alan and Britt (dungeon master Robert) play D&D. The four players play as their characters from Epic NPC Man, with whatever happens to the characters being deemed as canon in the Epic NPC Man universe.

value.name: Pop Team Epic
value.overview: Crude, rude, and a little…cute? Get ready for the larger-than-life attitude of Popuko and Pipimi, the small and tall stars of Pop Team Epic! Based off the bizarre four-panel webcomic by Bukubu Okawa comes a comedy that’ll throw you off with its out-there jokes and intense absurdity. You think you’re ready for these girls? Think again, F#%**er!

value.name: Bucket & Skinner's Epic Adventures
value.overview: Bucket and Skinner are best friends trying to navigate the minefield of high school politics, while surfing everyday and living the California dream.

value.name: Epic Drives
value.overview: Host and auto expert Arthur St. Antoine embarks on a high-octane global adventure in some of the world's coolest, fastest cars.

value.name: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants in Space
value.original_name: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants in Space
value.overview: Best friends George and Harold — along with their classmates and tyrannical principal — are recruited for a mysterious mission in outer space.
